channel.title: Please help
channel.description: ok on moparscape fourms ppl are junior members and senior members. we'll how many posts u need to get to be a senior member also whats rep?

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Community Member is a title that has nothing to do with this forum, it’s a title given to members on moparisthebest.com. Like Community member though, Moparscape veteran shares similar requirements. As a pretense, members have to be of at least 50 reputation points to qualify for nomination. Since its incredibly easy to achieve this standard though, I don’t think that part of the requirements is recognized. They do not have anything to do with post count. They are, however, determined by post quality. Notice that it’s not always about your registry date either.

Here is a list of all the possible awards you can achieve on either forum:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And here are the newest additions for moparscape members specifically:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

Junior member:1-50
Member:50-100
Senior Member:100-∞

No, there’s also Moparscape Vet and Community Member.

To bad its not based on post count.

It’s not??

Well I didn’t know that.
[/quote]no. its not. rly

orly[/quote]ya rly

and don’t worry about post :D, just post when you think you need to, and slowly you will get ranked up, but tbh Idk wasn’t really watching my post back then…but! …“Posts: 3,454 (5.125 per day)”
